PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05462017-05-19HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Statement, Notice and Conditional Registration)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (STATEMENT, NOTICE AND CONDITIONAL REGISTRATION) in order to (1) prevent possible unsafe or improper handling or use of unregistered foreign products imported via the import and use of foreign products provisions; (2) address the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations concerns regarding registrant, user and arbitrator liability; and (3) entrench the policy intent to no longer grant new conditional registrations and ensure the transparency (consultation and access to information) and reconsideration provisions of the Pest Control Products Regulations apply to all new registration decisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0091 Publication Date: 2017-05-31
AttachmentsAttachment
